name: Shell Pasta Salad with Salmon and Green Beans
author: Alison
summary: One of my favorite pasta salads. It is not only delicious but it's also low in fat. Enjoy.
ingredients: ¼ pound fresh green beans, cut into 1-inch lengths
¼ cup chopped fresh dill weed
directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil, add pasta and cook until al dente
Drain and rinse pasta under cold running water
Blanch green beans in boiling water for 2 minutes
Drain and rinse under cold running water
In food processor or through a sieve, puree cottage cheese
Combine with yogurt and lemon juice; mix well In a large bowl, combine pasta, green beans, yogurt mixture and dill; stir to mix
Discard skin from salmon and break into chunks; add to salad and stir gently to mix
Line serving plate with lettuce leaves and mound salad on top
